item.title: Making Available R Codes for Crop-Weed Competition Research
item.description:
My colleagues and I published a manuscript entitled Additive design: the concept and data analysis. Great thanks to Dr. Rodrigo Werle and Dr. Stevan Knezevic

As described in the summary above, this a method paper where we also provided the R codes for data analysis in RStudio. The original dataset is available for those who do not have crop-weed competition data but are willing to learn the modelling skills.

Both links are on my GitHub repository

  • R codes for additive design studies

  • Original Data

Making R codes available to everyone is part of my Open Source Weed Science project. In the next posts, I will be including more R codes for data analysis of weed research studies.
